Description: The technical specifications to refer when using the package. Easy-going, offline supported (via web PWA installation), and detailed oriented. Courtesy from ZORALab's Hestia.

Designs.Description: This component was designed by the following creators:
Designs.Title: Designers

Designs.Description:
This component has the following dependencies (arranged in the order from
left-top to right-bottom):
Designs.Title: Dependencies

Designs.Description: This component does not need any HTML codes. Relax.
Designs.Title: HTML

Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-trigger-z-index
CSS PROPERTY : z-index
DEFAULT      : calc(var(--z-index-max) - var(--z-index-nav-top)) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the trigger's z-index of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Z-Index (Trigger)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-z-index
CSS PROPERTY : z-index
DEFAULT      : var(--z-index-hidden) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the z-index of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Z-Index

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-z-index-opened
CSS PROPERTY : z-index
DEFAULT      : calc(var(--z-index-max) - var(--z-index-nav)) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the z-index of the rendered component when opened.
Designs.Title: Z-Index (Opened)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-overlay-z-index
CSS PROPERTY : z-index
DEFAULT      : calc(var(--z-index-max) - var(--z-index-nav-overlay)) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the overlay layer's z-index of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Z-Index (Overlay)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : .2rem solid var(--drawer-trigger-color) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-border-radius
CSS PROPERTY : border-radius
DEFAULT      : .5rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border radius of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border Radius

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-inverted) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-color-inverted
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component while in inverted mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Inverted Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-color-primary
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-600) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the primary color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color (Primary)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-background
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-800) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Background

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-transition
CSS PROPERTY : transition
DEFAULT      : var(--timing-normal) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the animation timing of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Transition

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-trigger-width
CSS PROPERTY : width
DEFAULT      : 5rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the trigger's width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Width (Trigger)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-trigger-height
CSS PROPERTY : height
DEFAULT      : 5rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the trigger's height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Height (Trigger)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-trigger-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : unset (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the trigger's border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border (Trigger)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-trigger-border-radius
CSS PROPERTY : border-radius
DEFAULT      : 50% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the trigger's border radius of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border Radius (Trigger)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-trigger-box-shadow
CSS PROPERTY : box-shadow
DEFAULT      : 0 0 2rem var(--drawer-overlay-background) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the trigger's box shadow of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Box Shadow (Trigger)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-trigger-box-shadow-focus
CSS PROPERTY : box-shadow
DEFAULT      : 0 0 4rem var(--drawer-overlay-background) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the trigger's box shadow of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Box Shadow (Trigger + Focused)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-trigger-font-size
CSS PROPERTY : font-size
DEFAULT      : 3rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the trigger's font size of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Font Size (Trigger)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-trigger-font-style
CSS PROPERTY : font-style
DEFAULT      : normal (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the trigger's font style of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Font Style (Trigger)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-trigger-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-contrast-100) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the trigger's color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color (Trigger)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-overlay-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : transparent (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the overlay layer's color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color (Overlay)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-overlay-background
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : rgba(0,0,0,.75) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the overlay's background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Background (Overlay)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --drawer-overlay-transition
CSS PROPERTY : transition
DEFAULT      : var(--timing-fast) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the overlay layer's animation timing of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Transition (Overlay)

Designs.Description: Fortunately, this component does not use any JavaScript. Relax.
Designs.Title: JavaScript

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package's primary purpose is to provide user interface (UI) styling
specifically for drawer navigator values. This page is already deployed all
usable drawer already.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Main Purpose

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package was known as 'drawer_hestiaUI' before ZORALab's Hestia 'v1.2.0'.
The transformation was due to someone attempting to steal the design copyrights
and makes way for programming package's documentation restructuring.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Legacy Recording

Title: zoralabDRAWER Technical Specification - ZORALab's Hestia
